column4: I just upgraded to Intrepid and now my wireless won't work. Networks show up on KNetworkManager (this is on Kubuntu) and KNetworkManager even show an icon indicating that the wireless is connected but it never truly connects
This is a T43 with an Intel Corporation PRO/Wireless 2200BG [Calexico2] Network card
you might want to try the kubuntu forum
not sure if the doc i sent is gnome specific or not
